nodes.text: The grappling boa was a long and flexible weapon made of triple rows of metallic scales. Both stylish and practical, it was named after a variety of snake, and could be used like a whip or lariat. When not used in combat, the boa could be draped around the shoulders like a scarf. During the Clone Wars, the Theelin bounty hunter Latts Razzi wielded a grappling boa as her preferred weapon.
